meanings.definition: A group of people who live in the sky.
meanings.sent1: The skymen soared through the clouds in their airship.
meanings.sent2: The skymen gathered in their floating city to watch the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The skymen held a celestial feast in their sky palace.
meanings.sent4: Legends speak of ancient skymen who ruled the heavens.
meanings.sent5: The children listened in awe to tales of the skymen who danced among the stars.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at navigating the sky.
meanings.sent1: The skymen expertly guided their hot air balloons through the sky.
meanings.sent2: As a skilled skymen, he knew every cloud's shape and every wind's direction.
meanings.sent3: The young skymen impressed everyone with their cloud-surfing abilities.
meanings.sent4: She was a true skymen, always finding her way through the vast sky.
meanings.sent5: The old skymen passed down their knowledge of the sky to the next generation.

meanings.sent1: The birds skymen gracefully above the treetops.
meanings.sent2: We skymen over the mountains in a hot air balloon.
meanings.sent3: The superhero skymen across the city to save the day.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams often skymen through the night skies.
meanings.sent5: The kite skymen freely in the strong breeze.
